stepTitle: Adnan has $40,000 to invest and hopes to earn $$7.1\%$$ interest per year. He will put some of the money into a stock fund that earns 8% per year and the rest into bonds that earns 3% per year. How much money should he put into each fund? (Answer in the form with the number of a variable followed by the first letter of the variable (stocks $$=$$ s, bonds $$=$$ b): 20s30b (These numbers are not the answers))
